<<<<<<< HEAD
The true guide to glory A sermon preached at Plympton-Mary in Deuon, at the funerals of the right vvorshipfull, and ... Barlow, John, b. 1580 or 81.
[8], 51, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Snodham, for Nathaniel Newberry, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill, London : 1619.
Dedication signed: I. B. [i.e. John Barlow]. Running title reads: The true guide vnto glory. Imperfect; title page mutilated with loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

Dedication signed: I. B. [i.e. John Barlow]. Running title reads: The true guide vnto glory. Imperfect; title page mutilated with loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
